title: WCAS SPANISH 220-0-22 Introduction to Literary Analysis
class_attributes:
Literature & Fine Arts Distro Area

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to textual analysis and to topics such as genre, narratology, prosody, and figurative language, aiming to prepare the student to read, discuss, and write analytically in Spanish about literature and culture.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 204 or AP 5 in Spanish Language AND Literature.

subject: SPANISH
